intro: Debregeasia pulchra, commonly known as the beautiful debregeasia, is a flowering plant native to Ethiopia. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae and is characterized by its striking, tubular flowers that are typically bright yellow or orange. The plant has lance-shaped leaves and produces small, woody fruits that contain seeds. It thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is often found in high-altitude regions. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and by plant enthusiasts.
